name: UP2037697 And I'll Be The Drummer
name_original: UP2037697 And I'll Be The Drummer
description:
And I'll Be  The Drummer,

A hypercasual rhythm game made in AGK  hit several problems along the way with the AGK engine that slowed development down and cause me to have to cut planned content so for now only 1 difficulty is playable and only 1 track . However there is 3 easter eggs to find hidden in there somewhere. All graphics and tracks not produced by myself are royalty free.

P.S im aware the beat matching is out but its the best i could do with time restraints and useing loops instead of read file.

Enjoy
